description: This file implements a SettingsProvider class in Dart for a Flutter application. It manages app locale preferences, allowing loading, updating, and retrieving supported locales. It also persists user preferences using SharedPreferences.

classes.name: SettingsProvider
classes.description: A provider class utilizing ChangeNotifier to manage and persist application locale settings and facilitate locale-dependent features.

methods.name: loadLocale
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the saved locale preference from shared preferences and updates the provider state.

methods.name: setLocale
methods.description: Updates the current locale and persists the change to shared preferences.

methods.name: getSupportedLocales
methods.description: Returns a list of supported Locale objects for the application.

methods.name: getLocaleName
methods.description: Returns the display name for a given language code.
